roleset.name: cause to have a preformed opinion

example.name: adjectival
example.text: But while better-off Filipinos are quick to cite the logic in using a language as widespread as English, they are often slow to reveal that they are prejudiced against Filipino, say advocates of the native language.

example.name: agentive
example.text: John's first experience with okra prejudiced him against Southern cooking forever.

roleset.note: PREJUDICE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'prejudice' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from prejudice.01-v predicate notes)
